doc.previous: Economy Comfort seats can be reserved by any Economy Class passenger. The Economy Comfort service is free for passengers with a full-fare ticket, for Flying Blue Platinum members and for Delta SkyMiles Platinum or Diamond members. Discounts apply for Flying Blue Silver or Gold members, SkyTeam Elite Plus members and Delta SkyMiles members.[101]
doc.after: The Economy Class seats on long-haul flights have a 31-to-32-inch (79â81Â cm) pitch and are 17.5 inches (44Â cm) wide.[94][99] All seats are equipped with adjustable winged headrests, a 9-inch (23Â cm) PTV with AVOD, and a personal handset satellite telephone which can be used with a credit card. Economy Class seats in Airbus A330-300 aircraft are equipped with in-seat power as well.[94] The Economy Class seats on short-haul flights have a 30-to-31-inch (76â79Â cm) pitch and are 17 inches (43Â cm) wide.[94][99] The Economy Class seats on short-haul flights do not feature any personal entertainment. The long-haul Economy Class seating is in a 3â4â3 abreast arrangement on the Boeing 747-400 and Boeing 777-300ER aircraft, a 3â3â3 abreast arrangement on Boeing 777-200ER aircraft and a 2â4â2 abreast arrangement on the Airbus A330 aircraft. The short-haul Economy Class seating is in a 3â3 abreast arrangement on the Boeing 737 aircraft, a 3â2 abreast arrangement on the Fokker 70 aircraft and a 2â2 abreast arrangement on the Embraer 190 aircraft.[96]
